purpose: This group serves as the central hub for high-priority criminal investigations and specialized operations within Vizianagaram district. Its core functions include coordinating drug enforcement drives, investigating major property crimes like jewelry heists and burglaries (including linking cold cases), responding to urgent alerts such as cyber security threats (phishing scams), and addressing critical incidents like missing child cases. The group also tackles organized crime activities, including illegal arms and ammunition smuggling, human trafficking, and illegal sand mining. It involves inter-agency coordination with financial institutions, cybercrime units, and neighboring police jurisdictions, ensuring intelligence gathering, suspect apprehension, and proactive crime prevention through public awareness campaigns.
